summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 BMW 328I. THE CONTACT EXPERIENCED AN ISSUE WITH THE SEAT BELT LATCHING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO NALLEY BMW OF DECATUR WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE SEAT BELT BUCKLE WAS DEFECTIVE AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 75,000.
